title: Ensemble Methods Exploration with Scikit-Learn
description: In this lab, we will explore ensemble methods using scikit-learn. Ensemble methods are machine learning techniques that combine multiple models to achieve better performance than a single model. We will specifically focus on two popular ensemble methods: Bagging and Random Forests.

meta.title: Ensemble Methods Exploration with Scikit-Learn
meta.description: Dive into ensemble methods like Bagging and Random Forests using Scikit-Learn for enhanced machine learning performance.
meta.keywords: ensemble methods, scikit-learn, bagging, random forests, machine learning
